pci_projects_project_storages_blocks_onb: You have not created a Block Storage service yet.
Get secure storage volumes with triple-replicated data, which can be used as additional disks.

Easily add disk space to your instances with these volumes. You can resize them to meet your requirements. You can also link several volumes to each instance. This link is done live; you can then dynamically transfer a volume between instances within the same location.
Choose the desired size, from 10 GB up to 4 TB. There are two versions of these volumes: “standard”, to prioritise the cost per GB, and “high-speed”, for the very best performance.
Create an additional volume and attach it to an instance
This guide provides step-by-step instructions on creating an additional disk and adding it to a cloud server.
A tutorial for configuring an additional disk on to a Public Cloud server
Increase the size of an additional disk
This guide will show you how to increase the size of an additional disk as well as enlarging its main partition.
